short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all fonts with either Comic Sans or Papyrus and randomizes colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to prank a friend? Need to get yourself off the internet? Is graphic design your passion? Here is the extension for you. This replaces all fonts on any website with either Comic Sans or Papyrus and it picks a random color for the text.
